name: immunized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
immunize
medical
  specialized to protect a person or animal against a disease by putting a substance into the body to make it produce antibodies (= proteins in the blood that fight disease): Children are routinely immunized against polio. Synonym
vaccinate
